text: wila tutie -aiyaha alrusula- kll 'insan kthyr alhilf kadhaab haqirin, mightab lilnaasi, yamshi baynahum bialnamimata, wayunqil hadith bedhm 'iilaa bed ealaa wajh al'iifsad baynahumu, bikhayl bialmal dinin bih ean alhuq, shadid almane lilkhayri, mutajawiz hddah fi aleudwan ealaa alnaas watanawal almuharimati, kthyr alatham, shadid fi kufrihi, fahish layiymi, mansub lighayr 'abihin. wamin ajla 'anah kan sahib maal wabanin taghaa watukabir ean alhuqi, fa'iidha qara ealayh 'ahad ayat alquran kdhdhab biha, waqalan: hdha 'abatil al'awalin wakharafatihim. wahadhih alayat wa'iin nazalat fi bed almushrikin kalwalid bin almughayrati, 'iilaa 'an fiha thdhyrana lilmuslim min muafaqat min aitasaf bihadhih alsfat aldhmimata
